other_information_file_id as otherInformationFileId, containment_worksheet as containmentWorksheet, containment_worksheet_file_id as containmentWorksheetFileId from dpcoi_rr_problem
order by id desc limit #{start},#{size}

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(users.`EMAIL`) FROM sys_users users WHERE users.`DELETE_STATE` = 0 AND FIND_IN_SET(users.`USER_NAME`,(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(problem.`persion_liable`) FROM dpcoi_rr_problem problem WHERE problem.`id` = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER})) > 0

select id, problem_status as problemStatus, problem_no as problemNo, problem_type as problemType, engineering, problem_progress as problemProgress, tracking_level as trackingLevel, happen_date as happenDate, customer, vehicle, product_no as productNo, bad_content as badContent, persion_liable as persionLiable, report_date as reportDate, Speed_of_progress as speedOfProgress, reason_for_delay as reasonForDelay, first_date as firstDate, second_date as secondDate, third_date as thirdDate, fourth_date as fourthDate, close_confirm as closeConfirm, close_confirm_id, close_confirm_time, product_line as productLine, severity, occurrence_frequency as occurrenceFrequency, bad_quantity as badQuantity, batch, happen_shift as happenShift, responsible_department as responsibleDepartment, record_ppm as recordPpm, record_num as recordNum, temporary, root_cause as rootCause, permanent_game as permanentGame, effect_verification as effectVerification, serial_number as serialNumber, quality_warning_card_number as qualityWarningCardNumber, product_scale as productScale, pfmea, cp, standard_book as standardBook, equipment_checklist as equipmentChecklist, always_list as alwaysList, inspection_reference_book as inspectionReferenceBook, inspection_book as inspectionBook, education, change_point as changePoint, expand_trace as expandTrace, artificial, materiel, state, is_delay as isDelay, containment_worksheet as containmentWorksheet, containment_worksheet_file_id as containmentWorksheetFileId from dpcoi_rr_problem where state = 1 and is_hide = 0 order by id desc

from dpcoi_rr_problem where state=1 and problem_progress = '1/5'
